mapper.sql: id, created_at, updated_at, title, project_id, project_code,token_name, token_count, token_cash, token_num, activity_remark, begin_dt, end_dt, activity_step, type, article_id, status,token_unclaimed, token_surplus_num,token_every_count,version
mapper.insert:
insert into activity_mining_activity (id, created_at, updated_at, title, project_id,project_code, token_name, token_count, token_cash, token_num, activity_remark, begin_dt, end_dt, activity_step, type, article_id, status,token_unclaimed,token_every_count,token_surplus_num,version) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tokenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tokenCash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tokenNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{tokenUnclaimed,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{tokenEveryCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{tokenSurplusNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update activity_mining_activity
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token_name = #{tokenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token_count = #{tokenCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token_cash = #{tokenCash,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
token_num = #{tokenNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_remark = #{activityRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_dt = #{beginDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_dt = #{endDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_step = #{activityStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token_unclaimed = #{tokenUnclaimed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token_surplus_num = #{tokenSurplusNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token_every_count = #{tokenEveryCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity_mining_activity
token_unclaimed = #{tokenUnclaimed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token_surplus_num = #{tokenSurplusNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version < #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM activity_mining_activity as mnact LEFT JOIN tbproject as tpj on tpj.project_id=mnact.project_id

select mnact.*, tpj.project_icon as projectIcon, tpj.project_chinese_name as projectChineseName FROM activity_mining_activity as mnact LEFT JOIN tbproject as tpj on tpj.project_id=mnact.project_id
ORDER BY begin_dt ASC LIMIT ${startRecord},${endRecord}

select * from
ORDER BY id DESC
